1565197761_1EFZ3dYDWVpD4kF5H9PF83HjPAehE.body: Decentralization will collapse a lot of power structures, and not just those attached to the government. They'll resist, they might even hit the kill switch.

> [bustooni](#comment_6_13v3xsu1y5pTbf3ZydiKYCZUhCFqdAs2NY): Should have added - love the idea and principle though.  Need to find ways to get this out to a wider audience and lessen the leap to get up and running for most.

I think the continued implosion of clearnet will continue to drive refugees to ZeroNet. It's only going to get worse, you know?

Also, I like that theres a bit of a challenge to getting onto ZeroNet, it acts as a filter of sorts to keep the mouth-breathers that ruined clearnet out.
